name: Toward the monolith
description:
Toward the Monolith is a Beat Them Up game in which you have to press correct inputs to beat monster attacking your village. 

Note : Only works with a XInput compatible gamepad (Xbox gamepads)

It's a Global Game Jam 2019 game made by:

Programmer: Valentin4311 (Itchio / Website)

Programmer/Level Designer: Cyriaque Loiseau

Sound Designer : Willy Lespagnol

Ux/Ui Designer/Graph: Alexis Subias
